alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:50AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Warren, southern Yazoo and Madison Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 150 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phoenix, or 15 miles northeast of Redwood, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flora and Little Yazoo around 205 AM CDT. Myrleville around 210 AM CDT. Way around 225 AM CDT. Sharon and Vaughan around 230 AM CDT. Camden, Cameron and Farmhaven around 240 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Satartia and Bentonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central and west central Mississippi.
